name: website
description: The code for my website, https://aaronslab.dev

scripts.min_html: npx html-minifier -c html-minifier.conf --input-dir public --output-dir public --file-ext html
scripts.inline_css: npx critical static/index.html -b static -i > public/index.html && npx critical static/iuse.html -b static -i > public/iuse.html && npx critical static/qna.html -b static -i > public/qna.html
scripts.build: npm run inline_css && npm run min_html && npm run min_css
